feed.title: GitHub Emacs Lisp Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Emacs Lisp in GitHub

entry.title: danrabinowitz/dotfiles
entry.summary:
This is the personal "dotfiles" repo of Dan Rabinowitz. YMMV.

To install these dotfiles on a new machine: ssh -A user@host

git clone git@github.com:danrabinowitz/dotfiles.git

mv dotfiles .dotfiles.git

cd .dotfiles.git

git status

make symlinks <----- TODO

exit

ssh user@host

Check that things look good
